Package art

Class DTrackHand

java.lang.Object
art.DTrackHand
public class DTrackHand
extends java.lang.Object
A.R.T FINGERTRACKING hand data (6DOF + fingers).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    protected DTrackHand​(int id)
    Constructor for not tracked hand.
    protected DTrackHand​(int id, int lr, double quality, double[] loc, double[][] rot, DTrackFinger[] finger)
    Constructor for tracked hand.

  • Constructor Details

    • DTrackHand

      protected DTrackHand​(int id)
      Constructor for not tracked hand.
      Parameters:
      id - ID number (starting with 0)

    • DTrackHand

      protected DTrackHand​(int id, int lr, double quality, double[] loc, double[][] rot, DTrackFinger[] finger)
      Constructor for tracked hand.
      Parameters:
      id - ID number (starting with 0)
      lr - Left (0) or right (1) hand
      quality - Quality (0 ≤ qu ≤ 1)
      loc - Location of back of the hand (in [mm])
      rot - Rotation matrix of back of the hand (3x3-dimensional)
      finger - Finger data (order: thumb, index finger, middle finger, ...)

      Returns ID number.
      Returns:
      ID number (starting with 0)

      public boolean isTracked()
      Returns if hand is currently tracked.
      Returns:
      Hand is tracked

    • getQuality

      public double getQuality()
      Returns quality.
      Returns:
      Quality (0 ≤ qu ≤ 1, no tracking if -1)

    • getLr

      public int getLr()
      Returns handedness.
      Returns:
      Left (0) or right (1) hand

    • getNumFinger

      public int getNumFinger()
      Returns number of fingers.
      Returns:
      Number of fingers (max. 5)

    • getLoc

      Returns location of back of the hand.

    • getRot

      Returns orientation of back of the hand.
